name: End Times
description:
End Times is a turn based local multiplayer PvP strategy game inspired by Darkest Dungeon and Pokemon. This is an early version of the game, so don't be too surprised about bugs. If you encounter any, the game can be reset by pressing Esc. Information about rules and mechanics in the README file.

Your first time loading the game may be... odd. simply opening the game again will make it work.

Credits: 

various SFX sourced from Zapsplat.com, freesfx.co.uk

All environmental art and music sourced from the Unity Asset Store
